name: Songwenfeng.GitHub.com
body:
# Introduction
This blog is the technology exchange platform on Machine learning and Deep learning. I will share my understandings, new improvements and other models reproduce experiment.
# Paper Sharing
New pulished papers simplyfied flow chart and ideas and my understanding
# Model implementation
Reproduce the new tricks and ideas in the papers.
# problem solving
When I met the problems, I will record the solutions and the problems. I hope this is useful for you.

#First Lesson
## SPP net training Process
 The paper is 'Spatial Pyramid Pooling in Deep Convolutional Networks for Visual Recognition',http://arxiv.org/pdf/1406.4729v2.pdf
The main idea is to avoid the crop and wrap in the tradition networks, the author add a spp layer in the CNN.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
